actions.recommendation: Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear
Regular Pap smear screening is important so that we can detect any irregularities early. This can be done at our practice.
Good sleep quality is important for your daily functioning as well as your general well being. Keep working on a good bedtime rhythm.
I am glad to hear that you are currently doing well with no concerns. If any symptoms arise, you can consult your GP for further investigation.
Regular self breast examinations are recommended. If you pick up any irregularities to consult for further investigation.
